lead_paragraph: FRIEDLANDER--Kurt A. Dear Daddy, I think about you everyday and remember your sense of humor and the many kind and wonderful things you did for me. You always went the extra mile. Love, Poohsie 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  FRIEDLANDER, KURT A

snippet: FRIEDLANDER--Kurt A. Dear Daddy, I think about you everyday and remember your sense of humor and the many kind and wonderful things you did for me. You always went the extra mile. Love, Poohsie 1/3
